statements: SELECT * FROM language_translation_data;
SELECT id, text_data FROM language_translation_data;
SELECT id, text_data FROM language_translation_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT text_data FROM language_translation_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM language_translation_data WHERE text_data LIKE '%example%';
SELECT * FROM language_translation_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT text_data FROM language_translation_data WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT id, text_data FROM language_translation_data WHERE id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT text_data FROM language_translation_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, text_data FROM language_translation_data WHERE id > 3 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT model_name, model_description FROM translation_models
SELECT model_id, model_name, model_description FROM translation_models ORDER BY model_name DESC
SELECT * FROM translations WHERE model_id = 1
SELECT translation_id, original_text, translated_text FROM translations ORDER BY translation_id ASC
SELECT model_id, COUNT(*) AS total_translations FROM translations GROUP BY model_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5
SELECT * FROM translation_models WHERE model_id = 1;
SELECT model_id, model_name FROM translation_models WHERE model_description LIKE '%important%';
SELECT model_id, original_text, translated_text FROM translations ORDER BY translation_id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT model_name, translated_text FROM translation_models INNER JOIN translations ON translation_models.model_id = translations.model_id;

SELECT model_id, model_name, COUNT(*) AS num_translations FROM translation_models LEFT JOIN translations ON translation_models.model_id = translations.model_id GROUP BY model_id HAVING num_translations > 0;
SELECT * FROM translations;
SELECT text_data FROM translations WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT language_name, language_code FROM languages ORDER BY language_name DESC;
SELECT model_name FROM models WHERE language_code = 'en' AND model_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM models JOIN languages ON models.language_code = languages.language_code;
SELECT * FROM translations WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT text_data FROM translations WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT model_name, language_name FROM models JOIN languages ON models.language_code = languages.language_code;
SELECT * FROM languages WHERE language_name = 'English';
SELECT model_name FROM models WHERE model_id IN (SELECT id FROM translations);
SELECT * FROM LanguageData WHERE language_id = 1;
SELECT language_id, text_data FROM LanguageData WHERE language_id > 10;
SELECT text_data FROM LanguageData WHERE language_id IN (2, 4, 6);
SELECT * FROM LanguageData WHERE text_data LIKE '%example%';
SELECT language_id, text_data FROM LanguageData ORDER BY language_id DESC;
SELECT language_id, text_data FROM LanguageData WHERE language_id = 1
SELECT text_data, language_id FROM LanguageData ORDER BY language_id DESC
SELECT * FROM LanguageData WHERE language_id > 3 ORDER BY text_data ASC
SELECT language_id FROM LanguageData WHERE text_data LIKE '%example%'
SELECT text_data FROM LanguageData WHERE language_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT * FROM translation_models;
SELECT model_id, model_name, creation_date FROM model_metadata ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT translation_id, source_text, target_text FROM translations WHERE translation_model_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT data_id, data_text, data_label FROM training_data WHERE data_label = 'spam' AND training_model_id = '87654321-4321-4321-4321-210987654abc' ORDER BY data_id ASC;
SELECT log_id, model_id, log_data FROM model_logs WHERE model_id = '98765432-9876-9876-9876-987654321abc' ORDER BY log_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM translation_models WHERE model_version > 2;
SELECT model_name, description FROM model_metadata WHERE creation_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT source_text, target_text FROM translations WHERE translation_model_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT data_text, data_label FROM training_data WHERE training_model_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY data_label DESC;
SELECT log_data, log_timestamp FROM model_logs WHERE model_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002' AND log_timestamp > '2022-03-01';
